name: Syrian Arab Republic: Broad money to total reserves ratio
description:
Broad money (IFS line 35L..ZK) is the sum of currency outside banks; demand deposits other than those of the central government; the time, savings, and foreign currency deposits of resident sectors other than the central government; bank and travelerâ€™s checks; and other securities such as certificates of deposit and commercial paper.
Broad money to total reserves ratio
